thread.title: Turnpike Authority ramps up flash flood abatement plans
thread.title_full: Turnpike Authority ramps up flash flood abatement plans

title: Turnpike Authority ramps up flash flood abatement plans
text:
Monkey Business Images Ltd Water Flooding Roads The Kansas Turnpike Authority announced Tuesday additional measures to keep water from crossing the toll road, the Wichita Eagle reports. Seven people have died since 2003 in flash flooding on a stretch of the turnpike south of Emporia. An additional flood monitor will be installed at mile marker 118 where a 21-year-old Texas man died when his car left the roadway in heavy rains. The Authority will also make changes to its drainage structure designs.
